Body:
pt_tr = ccl.nl_pt.PTNumberCountsTracer((ZZ, BZ), b2=b2, bs=(ZZ, BZ))
for b in [pt_tr.b1, pt_tr.bs]:
    assert b(0.2) == BZ_C
if b2 is not None:
    assert pt_tr.b2(0.2) == BZ_C
    zz = np.array([0.2])
    assert pt_tr.b2(zz).squeeze() == BZ_C
pytest.mark.parametrize('b2', [(ZZ, BZ), BZ_C, None])
